comments:

Note: This defect may be a regression introduced by https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=163173.

I did not reproduce the problem using HEAD.
I've fixed the NPE. 
As far as I can see this NPE occurs when a file is selected and that the test navigator is unable to return the associated proxy node. I've avoid the NPE to raise but I can't see the actual cause that leads to that situation.

The fact that the test navigator selection points to a file is unusual due to the proxy node mechanism. I guess this error was the consequence of other hidden issues. 
Have you information about the project you created ?
Is it just after the plugin project creation (finish of the create wizard) ?

Feel free to reopen with more information.

After investigation it seems that the selectReveal() method of the navigator is called with a built-in file selection in the link to editor mechanism.
The test navigator listens the activation of editors. Each time one is activated the test navigator tries to find the edited element of its tree from the file of the editor.
This could be related to the #145980 (http://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=145980).

(In reply to comment #1)
> Have you information about the project you created ?

Plug-in.

> Is it just after the plug in project creation (finish of the create wizard) ?

Yes (opening the context menu on the plug-in project.
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.
